definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to bite off more than one can chew (idiom)/to aim too high
decompression (in digital technology)/to extract data from a compressed file
interlude/to cross the stage/to do sth as a mere formality/to go through the motions
way of doing sth/the right social connection
happy to partake but not prepared to do any work (idiom)/all take and no give
to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
the will is there, but not the strength (idiom)/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
pinyin: xin1 you3 yu2 er2 li4 bu4 zu2
